activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#6296
activity.text:
Updated the preview component, TBD in EOD call 26/09/23

Moved the buttons on top of the image, the buttons are rather fixed at a particular position now.
![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/73941119/1b9ab87e-644e-450f-a637-b5ede1e52e1d)

Another proposed update with the stock backdrop effect, and title. Migrated all the icons to use the CareUI's Icons.
![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/73941119/1fd46fb1-0d57-44a3-b461-7a651a795dd2)

Probably with a bg to the title's div...
![image](https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/assets/73941119/354844c4-328f-4dab-85c9-91afa574e596)

activity.title: coronasafe/ayushma_fe#94
activity.text:
**Update Chanelog**: 

**Update**: Changed the traditional implementation to use a package called react-helmet.
**Plus Points:** Eases the declaration of meta-tags and lets us use them in the client component :) , one can write a dynamic description tag pretty easily as well.
